TopicTitle: Pteron Micro Shuttle and rescue vehicle Beta download available(9/9/2014)

Articles.Content: My Kerbal Stock Launcher Overhaul Might be able to do it

I heard you wanted to see if this is still being developed. Well,

https://i.imgur.com/SlUGdUw.png

So you make big progress .... *badum tss*
So... klipper lives?

So you make big progress .... *badum tss*

Exactly.

Good one. I had a good laugh

So... klipper lives?

If... that's how you call us developing then yeah.

Oh but for everyone, kinda tired today, I need a rest, it's got a couple bugs I dunno what it is but it's kinda hard importing, animating and breaking up the model, I hope you understand. The main hull already has cockpit and landing gear stuffed up as one import process so it's gonna be a long one and I am still discovering how to make landing gears.

Here's the screenshot of how it looks like with unmodified speculars. Ill still continue working with the textures for improvements.

Exactly.

Good one. I had a good laugh

Oh really? Nice But seriously get some rest before you burn yourself out.
Will do o/
Looking great Blackheart!

I wanna freak out by a BS i encounter when the wheel is deployed in the world itself. it has problems but when building, it looks beautiful.

lol dat perfect loop

I wanna freak out by a BS i encounter when the wheel is deployed in the world itself. it has problems but when building, it looks beautiful.

Nice! I am very excited for this shuttle. It looks like you're doing quite well on it.
Maybe not quite as well as you think haha

Maybe not quite as well as you think haha

Blackheart, I think the work you are doing is amazing. Second to that I guarantee it is better than the job I would be doing! I have just booted KSP up for the first time in weeks, I had left a ship in orbit around Laythe and i was struck once again by the fact that what is needed is a compact, reusable way to get Kerbals down to the surface of an atmospheric planet. A very small RAPIER engine might be required to get them back up again!
haha, I'm doing my best in terms of time management

Take your time please! I want this thing NOW but I know if I am patient and I wait it will be all the better. I just don't want it to die. I have been on these forums for 2 months now and I have had my heart broken a lot with beautiful MODS that just die or get unfinished. Real life is of course more important, but its so much of a tease Singularity Research Initiative has got to be the worst loss so far. Just don't break my heart ok.

hey what does he mean by "taking pre-orders"?

Hand over a billion dollars and you can have your own mini-shuttle

Guys, I'm having a hard time importing a hull + landing gear. Also, I think we should separate the landing gear from the hull. But Daemoria's model can't do that. Another thing is it's over-sized as you have seen in the first picture. So I would ask you. Would you agree for a reboot where I remodel (I'll stick to Daemoria's and the initial concept style), or should I just continue? I wouldn't mind to continue but... you know. Also, the landing gear isn't too detailed. I'll do some improvements if I remodel. PM-ing Sage too for this.
